evs.name: Police Identity Card or Passport
evs.description: Identity card of the applicant or a photocopy of it.

evs.name: TaxisNet Credentials
evs.description: Proves your residential address (e.g., utility bill, rental agreement).

evs.name: DYPA Credentials
evs.description: Required for financial and tax identification.

evs.name: Disability Certificate
evs.description: Proves your registration in the social security system.
